LanguageData.CantStartRitualNoConvertee: There is nobody to convert to {0}. You need a colonist or a heretic zealot of a different ideoligion.
LanguageData.CantStartFuneralForSlave: {0_labelShort} is a a zealot. Zealot don't get funerals.
LanguageData.NoSlaveBed: Need a zealot bed that is reachable, not reserved, and in safe temperature.
